risk.subtitle: Based on policy and environment safeguards.
risk.noNtpDetail: Clock drift affects audit and log accuracy.
risk.firewallOffDetail: Baseline input rules are required for safety.
risk.mgmtMissingDetail: Limit admin access to trusted ranges.
risk.mgmtWideDetail: Prefer /24 or narrower for admin ranges.
risk.bgpEnabledDetail: Ensure peer filtering and route policies are defined.
risk.ospfLargeDetail: Validate area design to avoid adjacency issues.
risk.firewallAllowAnyDetail: Allow any-any rules increase attack surface.
risk.natOpenDetail: Open DNAT rules can expose internal services.
risk.vpnNoPskDetail: Provide a strong PSK for IPsec tunnels.
risk.qosEnabledDetail: Ensure queues align with business priorities.
risk.snmpPublicDetail: Change SNMP community to a secure value.
